author: yeepeekoo
title: NFT Picture Profile AI generator
description: 在web3中，用户通过头像和图片资料（PP）进行互动。但是，如何才能根据心情、情况、故事来创建多个PP-NFT？

f6_assessments.q0: Nice idea, relatively low budget, could be a great way to get people interacting with NFT's they actually use by allowing them to morph their own images.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has a relatively simple plan outlined and seems to have the experience to back it up. Success would require that the generated pictures are one people actually want to use. I would be nice to have more details on what types of morphing are intended. I don't see any information on where the images themselves are intended to be hosted? Given the plan is to initially use the hardware then switch to cload software, I am not sure the best use of funds is buying a $6k computer. How long are you intending to use the PC for before switching to the cloud? Could you get that much compute for less than $6k?
f6_assessments.q2: The proposer has set out a timeline against which delivery can be audited. Whilst there are no metrics for the quality of images to be delivered, there are metrics with goals for the number of users. If the images aren't desirable, then you won't get the users, so we can measure success purely through the user numbers

f6_assessments.q0: This project proposes a dynamic variable avatar service that translates text-to-image by means of an AI generating NFTs. So in practice the avatar would change as text is written in the metaverse. This could generate more users on the Cardano blockchain as well as an increase number of transactions because the NFTs are minted with ADA.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer's claimed experience is relevant for most aspects of the task, except for the Plutus coding. That will be needed for NFTs on ADA. Consider making use of the seek-tags to find a Plutus engineer.
f6_assessments.q2: Although the proposal is short, it contains a lot of relevant information to determine the auditability. The idea has been conveyed very efficiently in the plan. Not bad at all.

f6_assessments.q0: I like a lot the idea, it could be very useful to apply generative models of AI for creating nfts for picture profiles. People like to customize their different profile photos, and in this way they could create different avatars depending on what they will use them for and changing parameters depending on different factors that will affect the final result of the nft. Of course the result of the proposal is an AI so this addresses the challenge
f6_assessments.q1: It explains how the product will be and it adds several milestones. In experience of the team, as it is written, the proposer has a lot of experience in the field, but there is not a way to check it
f6_assessments.q2: Those are not kpis, they do not measure the performance of the project. Very short description of what the success looks like and no timeline for checking the progress incrementally, more information is needed for auditing the progress of a proposal

f6_assessments.q0: Since the early days of web2 people have been obsessed with profile pictures and how they can communicate with a simple picture on how they stand in the world and a given time. This proposal plans on implementing AI to generate a PP by means of converting text-to-image. You give a picture of yourself and a few words and the AI will process this into an NFT picture of yourself. this idea fits well within the challenge settings.
f6_assessments.q1: For feasibility, we are seeing a good proposal but are missing information about the proposer. He states that he has the qualities needed for this proposal but does not provide evidence of this. We are provided with a website where AI-based pictures are presented but how do we know this comes from the proposer. I have no doubt that the relevant experience the proposer claims are true given the proposal itself but it would've been a nice addition to provide a link to LinkedIn or some other page.
f6_assessments.q2: Great work for auditability. We get everything needed for an audit. A clear roadmap with milestones. KPIs are reasonable and fit within the proposal. I have no doubt the community will be able to follow the progress of this proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal makes good use of AI for a clear use case with a well-defined market that is relevant both to Cardano and likely SingularityNet. However, I agree rather than strongly agree that the proposal meets the challenge brief because it does not make an explicit connection to SingularityNet or to the other guiding question on social benefit.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer articulates a clear delivery plan, and seems to have all of the skills required to make it happen. Importantly, he has a simple website demonstrating the ability to morph images with AI.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal includes an excellent set of KPIs, including numerical KPIs focusing on market uptake. The development plan is also clear on what will be delivered.

f6_assessments.q0: The proponent builds an AI text-to-image generator to automatically generate NFTs from real profile pictures transformed through keywords. In fact, on current social networking sites, many people like to use avatars and there are many applications used, but applications using blockchain are very few. One thing I wonder when the proponent mentions that this application is used for web3 and how will using a private server affect the decentralization of web3?
f6_assessments.q1: The identity, experience and skills of the proponent are stated difficult to determine via twitter. The proponent used a demo image website, but I'm not sure how the AI ​​will be used. The proposed amount is broken down, but more detail is needed on the costs of building the AI ​​and how many people the web will employ and for how long.
f6_assessments.q2: Fully outlined timelines and roadmaps with very challenging goals and clear KPIs, would be even better when articulating how to communicate to reach 1000 users in 2 months. The proposer has not taken into account the challenges and risks with solutions if any (for example, there are many users with different age personalities, this information will be used by AI to generate relevant images as diverse as how to attract them)

solution: 一个人工智能文本-图像生成器，通过关键词（悲伤、朋克、僵尸等）变形的真实个人资料图片，自动生成NFTs。
experience: 从事软件开发20余年，人工智能（神经网络）硕士，过去3个月在SOL/ETH上玩过人工智能算法和NFT自动生成。
